name: The Game Pro
description:
This is a cap made by The Game Pro in a size 7.
 The hat is navy blue and features a bill, 6 vent holes on the top, and a round shape.  On the front are the letters NC embroidered in light blue thread. 
 It measures approximately 4.5 tall, 6 wide across the brim, 6.75 wide, and 8.25 deep from front to back.
